description: To mitigate the elevation of privilege issue identified in CVE-2023-36399, affected users should apply the appropriate security updates for their systems. The updates are available for the following builds: Windows 11 version 23H2 for x64-based systems (10.0.22621.2715) with KB5032190; Windows 11 version 22H2 for x64-based systems (10.0.22621.2715) also has KB5032190; Windows 11 version 21H2 for x64-based systems (10.0.22000.2600) needs KB5032192; Windows Server 2022 (10.0.20348.2113) needs KB5032198; and for systems running Windows 11 version 21H2 for ARM64, the fix is through KB5032192. Users can download the updates via the following links: https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032198, https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032192, and https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032190.
